output_data_file_format_flag.description: Output data file format flag: 1 = ascii, 2 = binary, 3 = both

non_mass_conserved_initial_field_flag.description: Flag to write out non-mass conserved initial field (uofield.dat): 0 = do not write, 1 = write

initial_sensor_velocity_field_flag.description: Flag to write out the file uosensorfield.dat, the initial sensor velocity field: 0 = do not write, 1 = write

qu_staggered_velocity_file_flag.description: Flag to write out the file QU_staggered_velocity.bin used by QUIC-Pressure: 0 = do not write, 1 = write

generate_wind_startup_files_flag.description: Generate wind startup files for ensemble simulations: 0 = do not write, 1 = write
